text:
Changing your avatar
inside Discord is simple

and can be done using your
computer or phone app.
Let's start with a computer.
Either log in to your Discord account
through a web browser
or using the Discord desktop app.
Both processes are exactly the same,

so we will use the desktop
app for this tutorial.
On the home screen,
find your username in the bottom left

and click on the user-settings
icon to its right.
Under the "My Account" tab,
click on "Edit Profile."

From here, you can click
"Change Avatar" on the left

or click on your avatar
image on the right.

Choose your new avatar
image and click "Open."
Now you can adjust the placement and size.
Then hit "Apply."
Now let's go over this same process
on your mobile device.
Open the Discord app.

At the bottom, you'll see
your current avatar icon.
Click it.
This will bring you to your settings menu.

Now click on your avatar
image on the top left.
Select a new image,
adjust the placement and size,
then click "Choose."
